General.Name: Huasi Agricultural Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Huasi Holding Company Limited engages in the manufacturing and selling of fur and leather clothing; and accessories in China. The company offer mink, leather, luggage, cashmere clothing, etc. It also operates stores. The company was formerly known as Huasi Agricultural Development Company Limited and changed its name to Huasi Holding Company Limited in June 2015. Huasi Holding Company Limited was founded in 2009 and is based in Cangzhou, China.

2.Name: Ms. Huining  Xi
2.Title: Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
